name: Awesome Aerial Assault
description:
In a world where evil rules every inch of the sky, it's up to you to fight back using an assortment of weapons and items in your trusty spaceship. You will fly over lush fields, haunted mists, the pyramids of Egypt and more as you attempt to clear each stage as quickly and efficiently as possible!

Tap the up and down buttons on the screen to move vertically and press the gamepad button to shoot any enemies or powerups that enter your sights whilst trying to stay alive yourself.

I hope you enjoy the fast, frenetic gameplay and don't forget to enjoy the visuals and the soundtrack!
